TopicTitle: CNN "The Sixties" Space Race episode tonight 7/24.

Articles.Content:
Sick of watching death and destruction on CNN? I sure as hell am. I haven't watched CNN's new series "The Sixties" yet, but I am tonight. Produced by Tom Hanks so it should be really good. It airs 9pm est.

http://cnnpressroom.blogs.cnn.com/category/cnn-shows/cnn-originals/the-sixties/
I predict endless repeats of the Kennedy speech, shots of Soyuz and Sputnik, a brief mention of Apollo 1, a little bit of the Armstrong clip, and a big schoomzy ending.."Who really won"
Lol no dout it'll be the same shpiel, but I look forward to some fresh interviews.
Oh, they're doing the 1960's. I was hoping for the 1860's.
